title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2108.7 - Time of filing answer to protest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2108.7 - Time of filing answer to protest

State Regulations

Any person served with a protest as provided in section
2108.6
(b) of this

Part may, within 15 days from the date of service, file a verified answer
thereto, by filing the same with the administrator, together with proof of
service of a copy thereof upon the party filing the protest. The administrator
may, in his discretion, and for good cause shown, extend the time within which
to answer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2108.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
